survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer behaviors and preferences related to sustainable energy practices in residential settings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable energy practices do you currently use in your home?
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow respondents to select all applicable options.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable energy practices do you currently use in your home?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the performance of your current sustainable energy solutions?

questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale for clarity.
